steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I enter "standard_user" as the username
I enter "secret_sauce" as the password
I click the login button

elements.name: Add tow items to the cart

steps.name: I add "Item A" to the shopping cart
I add "Item B" to the shopping cart
the shopping cart badge should display "2"

name: Adding items to Shopping cart
description:
As a user
I want to add items to my shopping cart
So that I can purchase them later

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I enter "standard_user" as the username
I enter "secret_sauce" as the password
I click the login button
I should see the inventory page
I navigate to the login page
I enter "invalid_user" as the username
I enter "wrong_password" as the password
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"

arguments.val: Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I leave the "Username" field empty
I enter "secret_sauce" as the password
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Epic sadface: Username is required"
I navigate to the login page
I enter "standard_user" as the username
I leave the "Password" field empty
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Epic sadface: Password is required"

elements.name: Unsuccessful login with empty username and password

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I leave the "Username" field empty
I leave the "Password" field empty
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Epic sadface: Username is required"

name: Authentication - EcommerceDemoSite
description:
As a user
I want to log into the site
So that I can access my shopping cart and complete a purchase

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I enter "standard_user" as the username
I enter "secret_sauce" as the password
I click the login button
I add "Item A" to the shopping cart
I add "Item B" to the shopping cart
I have added "Item A" and "Item B" to the shopping cart
I visit the shopping cart page
I am on the checkout information page
I fill in the First Name "John"
I fill in the Last Name "Doe"
I fill in the Zip/Postal Code "12345"
I click "Continue"
I should be redirected to the Checkout Overview page
I review the items in the overview
I should see "Item A" and "Item B"
the total amount should be calculated as "item total + tax"
I click "Finish"
I should see the "Thank You" page
the shopping cart should be empty

name: Completing a purchase
description:
As a user
I want to complete the checkout process
So that I can purchase the items in my cart

elements.name: Verify the cart is empty after completing checkout

steps.name: I have completed the checkout process
I return to the inventory page
the shopping cart badge should not be visible

name: Cart reset after checkout
description:
As a user
I want to check that the shopping cart is reset after checkout

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I enter "standard_user" as the username
I enter "secret_sauce" as the password
I click the login button

elements.name: User fills in required checkout details

steps.name: I have items in my cart
I am on the checkout information page
I fill in the First Name "John"
I fill in the Last Name "Doe"
I fill in the Zip/Postal Code "12345"
I click "Continue"
I should be redirected to the Checkout Overview page
I navigate to the login page
I enter "standard_user" as the username
I enter "secret_sauce" as the password
I click the login button
I select Price (low to high) from the sorting dropdown
the items should be displayed in ascending order of price

name: Sorting items by price
description:
As a user
I want to sort the items by "Lowest Price"
So that I can find the cheapest items first

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I enter "standard_user" as the username
I enter "secret_sauce" as the password
I click the login button
I add "Item A" to the shopping cart
I add "Item B" to the shopping cart
I visit the shopping cart page

elements.name: Validate required fields in the checkout form

steps.name: I am on the checkout information page
I leave the "First Name" field empty
I click "Continue"
I should see an error message "First name is required"
I leave the "Last Name" field empty
I click "Continue"
I should see an error message "Last name is required"
I leave the "Zip/Postal Code" field empty
I click "Continue"
I should see an error message "Zip/Postal Code is required"

name: Checkout information validation
description: I want to use this template for my feature file

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I enter "standard_user" as the username
I enter "secret_sauce" as the password
I click the login button
I add "Item A" to the shopping cart
I add "Item B" to the shopping cart

elements.name: Verify items in the shopping cart

steps.name: I visit the shopping cart page
I should see "Item A" and "Item B" listed in the cart
the item names, quantities, and prices should match those in the cart

elements.name: Verify total price and tax calculation in the checkout overview page

steps.name: I am on the checkout overview page
I have "Item A" priced at $10 and "Item B" priced at $20
the item total should be $30
the tax should be $2.40 (8% of $30)
the total price should be $32.40
